Package domain

package domain
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bet
    This class represents a bet done by a single user.
    Card
    This class represents a credit card belonging to a user.
    Event
    This class represents an event in which the administrator can create questions and bet on them.
    Forecast
    This class represents a possible forecast for a question on which the application users can place their bets.
    Question
    This class represents a question on which administrators can generate forecasts for the users of the application to bet on.
    Transaction
    This class represents a transaction belonging to a credit card.
    User
    Represents a user that will be stored in the database.
